review: I was attempting to watch Netflix through my Sony Blu Ray DVD player and it was horrible!  It kept stalling to the point that it just wasn't worth watching. My niece told me about the Cromecast and it's fabulous! It hasn't stalled once. So glad I found this alternative!

review: I love Chromecast. I use it every day. It's the coolest thing ever. I'm really looking forward to what developers will come up with for it. As it is, it's still one of the handiest purchases I've made in a while

review: My wife and I love this thing.  We have it hooked up to our receiver, rather than directly to the TV, so I can't vouch for how well the auto-switching works.  However, we use this thing a ton.  We mostly use it for Netflix, but we also have All Access subscriptions to Play Music and it's great.  We ended up buying a couple as Christmas gifts!
